results.name: Expansion of x^2*(10-5*x+x^2)/((1-x)^4*(1-x^2)).
reference: J. Ser, Les Calculs Formels des Séries de Factorielles. Gauthier-Villars, Paris, 1933, p. 93.
link: J. Ser, Les Calculs Formels des Séries de Factorielles (Annotated scans of some selected pages)
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-5,0,5,-4,1).
formula: a(n) = 4*a(n-1) - 5*a(n-2) + 5*a(n-4) - 4*a(n-5) + a(n-6) for n>5. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 17 2020
a(n) = n*(n + 3)*(n^2 + 3*n - 2)/8 if n is even,
a(n) = n*(n + 3)*(n^2 + 3*n - 2)/8 - 1 if n is odd. (End)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x^2 (10 - 5 x + x^2) / ((1 - x)^4 (1 - x^2)), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 17 2020 *)
program: (MAGMA) R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), 60); [0,0] cat Coefficients(R!( x^2*(10-5*x+x^2)/((1-x)^4*(1-x^2)))); // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 17 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 16 2020
